'''Lind Erebros''' is a Russian composer. Specializing in video game soundtracks, Lind also released a trio of albums thematically tied to material from the [[Silmarillion]].<ref>https://www.youtube.com/c/LindErebrosMusic</ref>

==Albums==
* Rebirth of Light (2009)<ref>https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfOlldQ9WkfrGM8H-1gmv4uPdbAHVKMog</ref>
* Noldolante (2012)<ref>https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfOlldQ9WkfrJhFFnadG6rXAj-mM0qzX7</ref>
* Lay of Leithian (2015)<ref>https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfOlldQ9WkfrGTZWonanb0jW789HNXb7k</ref>
